title: Similar to Microgramma family
content:
Hi!

Can't find exact match to [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320091035/http:/www.bsstreet.lv/bsstreet/img/logo_bilde.gif). In original version should'nt be with the "grunge effect". Seems similar to EF Microgramma, but it's not the same. Anyone could help out with the name of typeface?

Thanx in advance!
author: edgarsk

comments.content:
I think the logo is just a customized Microgramma.  
You can notice that the URL hasn't the little differences (like the shorter stroke of the t).

Maybe, but the Microgramma have more like circle-like form. This one is quite quadratic shaped.

Here's an example what I mean - these glyphs is streched but have a little different shape. Anyway, not sure about this case.

[http://i40.tinypic.com/244xg76.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320091035/http:/i40.tinypic.com/244xg76.png "http://i40.tinypic.com/244xg76.png")
